decision_conditions:
<p><span style="line-height: 107%;">In the absence of a legal agreement with the LPA to restrict the
future occupiers to apply for parking permits, the proposal would be contrary
to Policy CS7 and CS15 of the Waltham Local Forest Plan - Core Strategy (2012)
and policy DM16 of the Waltham Forest Local Plan Development Management
Policies (2013).</span><br></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none">The
proposed development would result in an over intensified and poor form of House
in Multiple Occupation (HMO) to the detriment of future occupiers. The proposal
incorporates<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none">&nbsp;</p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none">(i) two
bedrooms which do not meet the minimum floor area for "bedrooms in shared
houses with kitchen facilities in a separate room"; and;<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none">&nbsp;</p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none">(ii) No
provision of a shared living room.</p><p>











</p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none">The
proposal would be contrary to Policy CS2 of the Waltham Forest Local Plan –
Core Strategy 2012 and Policy DM6 of the Waltham Forest Local Plan –
Development Management Policies 2013.<font face="Arial, sans-serif"><o:p></o:p></font></p>

<p><span style="line-height: 107%;">The internal floor space of the HMO building is 88sqm, 36sqm short of
the 124sqm internal floor space required by Policy DM6 for the conversion of a
larger home to an HMO (C4) and is therefore contrary to Policy DM6 of the
Waltham Forest Local Plan - Development Management Policies (2013).&nbsp;</span><br></p>
description: Planning application for retention of the property as a small House in Multiple Occupancy (HMO) (Use class C4) for 5 persons.
